name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anyblur - Conceal Sensitive Data in One Click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Any element text, image, input or paragraphs can be Blur with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anyblur.app 🛡️ - Instantly Safeguard Your Sensitive Data on the Web! Conceal any element text, image, input, or paragraphs with a single click.🖱️
Whether you're recording 🎥, screen sharing 💻, or presenting online 🌐, anyblur.app makes sure your sensitive data stays private. No editing needed!✂️

Effortlessly obscure text, paragraphs, images, inputs, or any chosen elements with just one click. Introducing a new 'Keep Blur' feature that preserves your blur settings even after a page reload.🔄

How to use it❓
 - One-Click Blur: Easily obscure headings, paragraphs, images, or videos with a single click.🖱️
 - Blur Zone: Draw a rectangle anywhere on the page, and we'll blur it while maintaining its position.🔲
 - Keep Blur: Click 'Keep Blur' before applying any blurs to preserve them after reloading or revisiting the URL.🔒
 - Customizable: Manage blur intensity, remove all blurs with a click, and even blur specific text. Additionally, conceal tab titles & icons for extra privacy.🛠️

What pros❓
 - User-friendly: Simply click to obscure any element on the page.👍
 - Customizable: Modify blur intensity, hide tab titles & icons.🛠️
 - Adaptable: Applicable for various professional and personal use cases.🌟

What cons❓
 - License needed: Visit anyblur.app to acquire your license.🔑

Enhance your online security and privacy with anyblur.app for a safer and more private browsing experience.🔐
